evidence.claim: Global Tech Billing utilizes AWS for scalable infrastructure and secure online billing services.
Company documentation mentions compliance with HIPAA standards for handling sensitive patient data.
Integration with various EHRs is achieved through established FHIR standards.
Supports multiple X12 transaction sets for electronic claims processing.

icp.icp_reason: Utilizes X12 formats and APIs for healthcare billing, aligning with ICP criteria.
